entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers except a few wet flurries over higher terrain late this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 16 April 2023
